text: Thanks, looks like you've got the idea and I've assigned you to r-dev-day issue #59. However, when making the changes for that issue, please create a new branch from the devel branch, not main (we use main as the release branch and use the devel branch to prepare for the next release of the container). Also, as described on the issue, run the container on GitHub codespaces to get the screenshots for your new docs.

elements.text: Thanks, looks like you've got the idea and I've assigned you to r-dev-day issue #59. However, when making the changes for that issue, please create a new branch from the devel branch, not main (we use main as the release branch and use the devel branch to prepare for the next release of the container). Also, as described on the issue, run the container on GitHub codespaces to get the screenshots for your new docs.
